solution_line_template: If the card with the letter X has half the number the card with letter W has, it has {half_fraction}*{w_tag}= {x_tag}
Together, cards with letters W and X have tags that total {x_tag}+{w_tag} = <<{x_tag}+{w_tag}={w_x_total}>>{w_x_total}.
If the card with the letter Y has the total of the numbers cards with letters, W and X have, then the total for cards with letters W, X, and Y is {w_x_total}+{y_tag} = {w_x_y_total}
Since the card with the letter Z has a tag of 200, the total of the numbers the tags have is {w_x_y_total}+{z_tag}= {total_tagged_numbers}
